task.title: Back Up and Restore a DASManager-Configured Storage Controller

context.p: To backup a DASManager-configured storage controller:

step.cmd: Perform a database backup as described in Back Up and Restore the Database.

substep.cmd: Store the output of the vgdisplay, pvdisplay, and lvdisplay settings for Eucalyptus volumes. For this example, $dasdevice is the value configured for the SC, which can be discover with the following command:

info.p: If the return value is an LVM volume group, then the following example will work. If it is a raw disk, then Eucalyptus SC will have created a Volume Group with a name like: "euca-vg-abcd123", use that value for $dasdevice.

step.note: You must have enough disk space to store copies of all your volumes.
step.cmd: Save the content of each volume into a backup file. For example:

info.codeblock: for vol in 'lvdisplay $dasdevice -C | awk '/euca/ {print $1}'`; do echo $vol ; dd if=$dasdevice/$vol of=$backup_dir/$vol bs=1M; done
